data.name: Name
data.proportional_function: Function to use (linear is less aggressive)

data.proportional_bias: A bias to use in proportional algorithm

data.tpi_coefc: Coefficient to use for internal temperature delta
data.tpi_coeft: Coefficient to use for external temperature delta

presets.title: Presets
presets.description: For each presets, give the target temperature

window.title: Window management
window.description:
Open window management.
Leave corresponding entity_id empty if not used.

motion.title: Motion management
motion.description:
Motion sensor management. Preset can switch automatically depending of a motion detection
Leave corresponding entity_id empty if not used.
motion_preset and no_motion_preset should be set to the corresponding preset name

data.motion_preset: Preset to use when motion is detected
data.no_motion_preset: Preset to use when no motion is detected

power.title: Power management
power.description:
Power management attributes.
Gives the power and max power sensor of your home.
Then specify the power consumption of the heater when on.
All sensors and device power should have the same unit (kW or W).
Leave corresponding entity_id empty if not used.

presence.title: Presence management
presence.description:
Presence management attributes.
Gives the a presence sensor of your home (true is someone is present).
Then specify either the preset to use when presence sensor is false or the offset in temperature to apply.
If preset is given, the offset will not be used.
Leave corresponding entity_id empty if not used.

data.presence_sensor_entity_id: Presence sensor entity id (true is present)
data.no_presence_preset: Preset to use when no one is present
data.no_presence_offset: Temperature offset to apply to current temperature is no one is present
